name: Baklava
description: Media request management system for Jellyfin with search enhancements
overview: Allows users to request movies and TV shows, with admin approval workflow, status tracking, and enhanced search features. Includes local/global search toggle, request dropdown menu with carousel layout, and library integration.

versions.changelog:
Improvements and fixes:
- Make search global by default (users can toggle to local)
- Remove hardcoded TMDB API key - add via plugin settings
- Comment out custom logo - use Jellyfin's default logo
- Add ApiClient polyfills for import functionality
- Global search now default instead of local search
